# R-Ladies Montpellier meetups

Since december 2018, I co-organised with [Criscely](https://twitter.com/CriscelyLP) the R-Ladies Montpellier [meetups](https://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/rladies-montpellier/). 

You can follow R-Ladies Montpellier on [twitter](https://twitter.com/RLadiesMontpel) and [github](https://github.com/r-ladies-montpellier).
